page.title: 11LINGFIELD PARK RACE COURSE
page.content: Lingfield Park Race Course is owned by a small group of people, one of whom is himself an ex_jockey. Lingfield Park itself covers 260 acres and gives fulltime employment to 35 people. The jobs range from secretaries, catering staff, gardeners and general odd job and repair employment. The Park offers facilities other than racing in form of a Conference and Training Centre, and in the near future there will be a golf club and a large playground for the children who come to the races with their parents. The Park makes most of its money through the entertainment facilities it offers business people. There is a choice of boxes and suites available for lease or daily hire. The prices range from Â£200 per day for a private box to Â£600 per day for the Eclipse Suite suitable for 100 guests.
